snippet: Bravo’s new reality show “Shahs of Sunset” raises questions about the “Persian-ness” of modern Iranian-Americans.
abstract: Bravo’s new reality show Shahs of Sunset raises questions about the 'Persian-ness' of modern Iranian-Americans; program follows a group of affluent Los Angeles-area friends who describe themselves as Persian, but it is unclear how the show will be received by American audiences.
lead_paragraph: Bravo’s new reality show “Shahs of Sunset” raises questions about the “Persian-ness” of modern Iranian-Americans.

headline.seo: The Persian-ness of ‘Shahs of Sunset’ on Bravo
headline.main: A New Persian Empire Plants a Personal Flag
headline.print_headline: A New Persian Empire Plants a Personal Flag
